item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/creating-a-simple-cluster-on-a-single-linux-host#comment-494572">victor kerber</a>.
Is the ndb_mgmd process running on the same machine where you're trying to start the data node? If not then you you need to explicitly provide its location... <code>ndbmtd --connect-string="other-host:1186"</code>.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to victor kerber.

Is the ndb_mgmd process running on the same machine where you’re trying to start the data node? If not then you you need to explicitly provide its location… ndbmtd --connect-string="other-host:1186".
